## TrackableCamera.addEntity() method

Allows you to add an entity that you want to track

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEntity(entity: Entity, tag: BaseTrackableMetadata, entityId: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entity | Entity | the entity you want to track |
|  tag | [BaseTrackableMetadata](./dcl-analytics-tracker.basetrackablemetadata.md) | metadata. |
|  entityId | string | Unique identitifier for the entity |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
